prompts.basePrompt: Create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the character in the picture, in a realistic style, in a real environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base. The content on the computer screen is a 3D modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a toy packaging box, designed in a style reminiscent of high-quality collectible figures, printed with original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations of the figurine.

A close-up, professionally composed photograph showcasing a hand-crocheted yarn doll gently cradled by two hands. The doll has a rounded shape, featuring the cute chibi image of the uploaded character, with vivid contrasting colors and rich details. The hands holding the doll are natural and gentle, with clearly visible finger postures, and natural skin texture and light/shadow transitions, conveying a warm and realistic touch. The background is slightly blurred, depicting an indoor environment with a warm wooden tabletop and natural light streaming in from a window, creating a comfortable and intimate atmosphere. The overall image conveys a sense of exquisite craftsmanship and cherished warmth.

Transform the uploaded image into a superhero-style action figure displayed in collectible packaging. The figure should be in a dynamic pose with detailed costume and accessories. Package design should include a transparent display window, brand logo, and character artwork on the backdrop card.

Create an adorable chibi-style 3D figure of the character with oversized head, small body, and cute proportions. The figure should be standing on a decorative base with vibrant colors and glossy finish, photographed in a display case with soft lighting.

Transform into a handmade clay figure with soft, rounded features and pastel colors. The figure should have a matte finish with visible hand-sculpting marks, placed on a simple wooden display stand with natural lighting highlighting the craftsmanship.
